attributes.action: Stops Selling Junk Food in Hospitals!
attributes.additional_details:
Stop Selling Junk Food in Hospitals!
My local hospital serves low quality food to staff and patients.Good quality food is the only things that make people feel better.We have a Warrens Bakery selling salad rolls filled with mayo! not healthy! Also Serco franchises selling More junk food ie chips,sweets,sugar drinks etc

I would like to see the Government put an outright ban on unhealthy food sold in hospital shops and cafe's. On fresh ingredients and produces to be served from local suppliers.
